vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Included with: ἀσφαλός, ὁ,
name of a bird, [Refs 5th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: carefully, securely; under guard; assuredly, beyond a doubt
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
carefully, securely; under guard; assuredly, beyond a doubt
securely, safely; without fail, safely, Mk. 14:44; Acts 16:23; certainly, assuredly, beyond a doubt Acts 2:36*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: adv. con seguridad, bajo vigilancia ; con certeza, sin lugar a dudas
